document.full_text: versatile singer/songwriter andrew gold, who enjoyed chart success in the 1970s with the songs "lonely boy" and "thank you for being a friend," died in his sleep. he was 59.
document.title: "lonely boy" singer andrew gold dead at 59
lines_and_colors: versatile singer/songwriter andrew gold, who enjoyed chart success in the 1970s with the songs "lonely boy" and "thank you for being a friend," died in his sleep. he was 59.
